text: Hi Jay, with the new local development beta you can sync your local files to HubSpot. We use a sandbox portal for development and the clients portal for production. You can even define a DEV and PROD portal in the config.

Reminder the HubSpot Developer Community Meetup of 2019 is happening Tuesday starting at 9:00 AM EST <https://devday.splashthat.com/>

Hear from top developers in this community, ask questions to the HubSpot Product team. It’s going to be great, and you’re invited. If you didn’t RSVP - sorry we’ve hit our in-person limit. We will be livestreaming the event however and you can still join us virtually.

The speakers are all traveling in and getting pumped up to have a great day.

Remember this is an event FOR the community BY the community. We’re all developers, and we’re all getting together because we want to have fun, we want to talk geek to people who get it, and we want to learn.
